channel.title: RStats on Ajay Koli
channel.description: Recent content in RStats on Ajay Koli

item.title: Extraordinary Slides using xaringanExtra
item.description: It was my first international RStats talk as a resource person. Thank you so much to the awesome R-Ladies Urmia team, especially to Nasrin, Yalda and Maryam (the event moderator).

item.title: R For Beginners
item.description: Thank you #RStats community for showering your love on my slides. ðŸ˜€ I'm very happy to share #RStats slides (~240) from my course "R For Beginners". It includes five modules - basics of R, Rmd docs, viz, dplyr, & xaringan. The beautiful CSS slide style is adapted from the work of @apreshill. Please give ur feedback ðŸ”— https://t.co/oPXfmhsY6N — Dr Ajay Koli (@ajay_kolii) January 30, 2022 Session 1: The Basics of R & RStudio Session 2: Dynamic Documents using R Markdown Session 3: Data Visualisation using ggplot2 Session 4: Data Wrangling using dplyr Session 5: Slide Crafting using xaringan
